decision_conditions: The proposed development does not constitute permitted development by virtue of the provisions of Part 3, Class T of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) as the existing use is a dwelling (Use Class C3) and therefore does not fall within a use class, Class B1 (business), Class C1 (hotels), Class C2 (residential institutions), Class C2A (secure residential institutions) or Class D2 (assembly and leisure), that allows for the proposed change of use.

The proposed development does not constitute permitted development by virtue of the provisions of Part 3, Class T of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) as the proposal has not demonstrated that sufficient off street parking/manoeuvring/access arrangements would be provided, and therefore the development is considered to result in sub-standard car parking provision leading to on-street parking to the detriment of pedestrian and highway safety.

The proposed development does not constitute permitted development by virtue of the provisions of Part 3, Class T of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) as the proposal has not demonstrated that the use would not result in unacceptable impacts on adjoining residential occupiers by reason of noise and disturbance or that sufficient mitigation measures would be provided to protect the occupants of nearby residents from noise and disturbance.
description: Development of a Childcare/Montessori Nursery school for Early Years (Prior Approval)
